name: DeFe47
description:
it's only you, 5 random weapons, and  4 other  another evil-looking cyborg in this tiny retrowave- style gungame deadmatch!

What does DeFe47 offer:

- real time chat, why not?

-scoreboard, score 10 points to win!

-one map, 5 guns, tons of bugs!

-retro style graphics but random not-so-retro style sounds

DeFe47 is not a competitive game, it's my first 3d and multiplayer project. It has TONS of unknown bugs, sometimes you can't connect 4 players in the same room. Try to not join a room without a host (if your player spawns in the center of the map, then something went wrong).

 Hamachi/other port-fowarding shenanigans are required to play

Sounds/Musics:

-Cyber rain/ Cyber monk by Iamoneable

-Future travel by Zodik

-knife/shuriken  sounds by Philippe Groarke

-rifle/gun sounds by Michael Klier

-reload sound by Michel Baradari

-chainsaw by August Sandberg
